function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of detailed behavior tracking data","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling of disease spread and effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Implement systems to track and analyze resident behavior and interactions","Technologies":"Behavior tracking and contact tracing technology","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Late and lax epidemic prevention and control measures abroad","Impact":"Higher risk of uncontrolled spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement strict and early epidemic prevention and control measures","Technologies":"Digital surveillance, testing and contact tracing technology","People":"Governments, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Assumption about the means of transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Inaccurate modeling of disease spread and effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Gather and analyze data to verify means of transmission for accurate modeling","Technologies":"Epidemiological surveillance, data analytics","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
